name: huemcp
description: Control Philips Hue lights through MCP

bridge_ip.title: Hue Bridge IP Address
bridge_ip.description: IP address of your Philips Hue Bridge. Optional. Use discover_bridge tool if not provided

api_key.title: Hue API Key
api_key.description: API key for authenticating with the Hue Bridge. Optional. Use complete_bridge_setup tool if not provided

tools.name: discover_bridge
tools.description: Discover or re-discover Philips Hue Bridge on the network. Returns IP address. Use this tool for initial setup or to reconfigure the bridge connection. After discovery, press the physical link button on the bridge and call complete_bridge_setup within 30 seconds.

tools.name: complete_bridge_setup
tools.description: Complete or reconfigure Hue Bridge setup by creating API key. Use this tool for initial setup or to reconfigure the bridge connection. Call this after discover_bridge and pressing the physical link button on the bridge (within 30 seconds of pressing the button).

tools.name: list_lights
tools.description: List all available Philips Hue lights

tools.name: set_light_state
tools.description: Turn a Hue light on/off or set its brightness and color

tools.name: list_zones
tools.description: List all available Philips Hue zones

tools.name: update_zone
tools.description: Control all lights in a zone at once. Can set on/off state, brightness, and color for the entire zone.
